title: Andermarch Cicogna Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled in the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder. Scholarships will support students in Italian and/or Women & Gender Studies.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled in the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder. Scholarships will support students in Italian and/or Women & Gender Studies.
